text: @DailyCaller @NYGovCuomo is a f*cking idiot who is trying to shirk responsibility for his high number of nursing home deaths. NY nursing homes - 5k deaths. All of Florida - 3.300 deaths.  Cuomo can try but the baddie here isn’t @GovRonDeSantis  - it’s Cuomo. #CuomoKilledGrandma #COVID19
